in next 28 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 5 times single_crochet in next 14 sts slip_stitch in first st fasten_off 180 ashley dunham 2015 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only moonunitdesigns com bed cushion row 1 chain 23 row 2 single_crochet across chain 1 turn row 3 single_crochet across chain 1 turn continue in this manner until you have a scarf measuring about 66 long bed cushion cont fold the scarf in half lengthwise and slip_stitch shut in small sections while stuffing with fluff do not sew seam over the ends of the tube they need to remain open so they meet up all nice like in the end make sure to start slip stitching your tube shut on the beginning/foundation side that way if you need to add or subtract row to make the ends of the tube meet neatly you can do
